official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of a national "Freedom Flag".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate a certain flag (designed to symbolize the American hostages in Iran and the Missing-In-Action in Southeast Asia) as the national "Freedom Flag."

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of a national "Freedom Flag".
